item.text: There is therefore now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of the <st data-num="2222" class="">life-giving</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> has <st data-num="1659" class="">set</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1659" class="">free</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> achieved <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="102">could not</st> do <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st><n id="1" /> it was <st data-num="770" class="">weakened</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>. By <st data-num="3992" class="">sending</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3667" class="">likeness</st> of <st data-num="266" class="">sinful</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>, he <st data-num="2632" class="">condemned</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>,
so that the righteous requirement of the law may be fulfilled in us, who do not walk according to the flesh but according to the Spirit.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> those who <st data-num="1510" class="">live</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> have their <st data-num="5426" class="">outlook shaped</st> by<n id="1" /> the things of the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> those who live <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> have their outlook shaped by the things of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="5427" class="">outlook</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> is <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="5427" class="">outlook</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> is <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>,

<st data-num="1360" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="5427" class="">outlook</st> of the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> is <st data-num="2189" class="">hostile</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> it does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5293" class="">submit</st> to the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> is it <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to do so.

Those who <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="700" class="">please</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">however</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="1512">if indeed</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3611" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="3778">this person</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">belong</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, your <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> is <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because of</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> is your <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>.
Moreover if the Spirit of the one who raised Jesus from the dead lives in you, the one who raised Christ from the dead will also make your mortal bodies alive through his Spirit who lives in you.
So then, brothers and sisters, we are under obligation, not to the flesh, to live according to the flesh

(<st data-num="1063">for</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>, you <st data-num="3195" class="">will</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="599">die</st>),<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> you <st data-num="2289">put to death</st> the <st data-num="4234" class="">deeds</st> of the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>, you will <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> who are <st data-num="71" class="">led</st> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
For you did not receive the spirit of slavery leading again to fear, but you received the Spirit of adoption, by whom we cry, “Abba, Father.”

The <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="4828">bears witness to</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>.
And if children, then heirs (namely, heirs of God and also fellow heirs with Christ)—if indeed we suffer with him so we may also be glorified with him.
For I consider that our present sufferings cannot even be compared to the coming glory that will be revealed to us.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="2937" class="">creation</st> <st data-num="603">eagerly waits</st> for the <st data-num="602" class="">revelation</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="2937" class="">creation</st> was <st data-num="5293" class="">subjected</st> to <st data-num="3153" class="">futility</st>—<st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1635" class="">willingly</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> of God<n id="1" /> who <st data-num="5293" class="">subjected</st> it—<st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st>

<st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="2937" class="">creation</st> <st data-num="846" class="">itself</st> will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> be <st data-num="1659">set free</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1397" class="">bondage</st> of <st data-num="5356" class="">decay</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glorious</st> <st data-num="1657" class="">freedom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="2937" class="">creation</st> <st data-num="4959" class="">groans</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4944">suffers together</st> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>.

<st data-num="3756" class="">Not</st> <st data-num="3440" class="">only</st> this, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="846" class="">ourselves</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st>, who <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="536" class="">firstfruits</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4727" class="">groan</st> <st data-num="1722 1438">inwardly</st> as we <st data-num="553">eagerly await</st> our <st data-num="5206" class="">adoption</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="629" class="">redemption</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">bodies</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> in <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> we were <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>. <st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> that <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="991" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="5101">who</st> <st data-num="1679" class="">hopes</st> for what he <st data-num="991" class="">sees</st>?
But if we hope for what we do not see, we eagerly wait for it with endurance.
In the same way, the Spirit helps us in our weakness, for we do not know how we should pray, but the Spirit himself intercedes for us with inexpressible groanings.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> he<n id="1" /> who <st data-num="2045" class="">searches</st> our <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">knows</st> the <st data-num="5427" class="">mind</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> the Spirit<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1793" class="">intercedes</st> <st data-num="5228">on behalf of</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> will.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> <st data-num="4903">work together</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> for those who <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, who <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2822" class="">called</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> his <st data-num="4286" class="">purpose</st>,

<st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3739">those whom</st> he <st data-num="4267" class="">foreknew</st> he <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4309" class="">predestined</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4832" class="">conformed</st> to the <st data-num="1504" class="">image</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Son</st>, <st data-num="1519">that</st> <st data-num="846">his Son</st><n id="1" /> would be the <st data-num="4416" class="">firstborn</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>.<n id="2" />
And those he predestined, he also called; and those he called, he also justified; and those he justified, he also glorified.
What then shall we say about these things? If God is for us, who can be against us?

<st data-num="1065" class="">Indeed</st>, <st data-num="3739">he who</st><n id="1" /> did <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="5339" class="">spare</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3860" class="">up</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>—<st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> will he <st data-num="3780" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st>, <st data-num="4862">along with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="5483">freely give</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st>?

<st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> will <st data-num="1458">bring any charge</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="1588" class="">elect</st>?<n id="1" /> It is <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> who <st data-num="1344" class="">justifies</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> is the one who will <st data-num="2632" class="">condemn</st>? <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> is the one who <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> (<st data-num="1161">and</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> than that, he was <st data-num="1453">raised</st>), <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="1188">right hand</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2532">also</st> is <st data-num="1793" class="">interceding</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> will <st data-num="5563" class="">separate</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>? Will <st data-num="2347" class="">trouble</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4730" class="">distress</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1375" class="">persecution</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3042" class="">famine</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1132" class="">nakedness</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2794" class="">danger</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3162" class="">sword</st>?<n id="1" />
As it is written, “For your sake we encounter death all day long; we were considered as sheep to be slaughtered.”

<st data-num="235" class="">No</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> we have <st data-num="5245">complete victory</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> him<n id="2" /> who <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I am <st data-num="3982" class="">convinced</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>, <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="746">heavenly rulers</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="1764">things that are present</st>, <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="3195">things to come</st>, <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">powers</st>,
nor height, nor depth, nor anything else in creation will be able to separate us from the love of God in Christ Jesus our Lord.
